author: GamingBolt
description:
So you've finally finished Ghost of Yotei's story, completing Atsu's quest for revenge and potentially cementing her legacy. However, Sucker Punch Productions' open world has so much more to offer outside of the story, from additional activities and side quests to random events and happenings. You could spend dozens of hours simply roaming Ezo and taking in the sights, but what are some of the most noteworthy things to do in the post-game?

We'll delve into every little thing, including some of the most notable Mythic Tales to pursue and what the Unfinished Business activities entail. You may even learn about the fate of a beloved character from the previous game. Without further ado, here are 15 things to dive into after completing Ghost of Yotei.
title: Ghost of Yotei - 15 Things To Do After COMPLETING THE GAME

author: GamingBolt
description:
Pokemon Legends: Z-A is finally here, and we've been having a blast as we explore Lumiose City and pit our Pokemon against the best that this new adventure has to offer. The game does bring interesting new additions to the table, and not all of them are evident from the get go.

Keeping that in mind, we've put together a few tips and tricks from our time in the game, aimed at ensuring a more consistent progression path for players who have dived in and begun to ascend the ranks among Lumiose's other trainers. 

From ways to make exploring the city easier and tips to improve your fighting strategies, we're here to ensure that you and your party are putting their best foot forward at all times!
title: 15 Advanced Pokémon Legends: Z-A Tips And Tricks I Wish I Knew Before Playing

author: GamingBolt
description:
Despite arriving four years after the original, the sequel picks up about a year after Murai's betrayal and the destruction of the Dark Dragon Blade. Between the events of Dragon Sword and The Vampire War, a comic in which Ryu fights against the vampire fiend Crimson, the Dragon Ninja had kept busy. 

At the latter's end, Momiji reveals that the Black Spider Ninja Clan is heading to Tokyo. It's unknown exactly why, but being directly opposed to the Hayabusa Clan and having dealings with Fiends (which spurred their own hunt for the Dark Dragon Blade in the first game), Ryu is keen to know what's going on.
title: The Full Story of Ninja Gaiden 2 - Before You Play Ninja Gaiden 4
